previous.excerpt:
Keep the GME posts to this megathread. Remember: wsbmod
[https://twitter.com/wsbmod] twitter account is live!

Citron's event is at 11:30am today, so plenty to discuss.

Non-quality memes, DD, and other shitposts outside of this thread will be
deleted.
